channel.title: Andrew J. Farkas
channel.description: Recent content on Andrew J. Farkas

item.title: Food is Hard
item.description: My experience with Avoidant/Restrictive Food Intake Disorder

item.title: My pronouns
item.description: They/he for Hactar, he/they for Andrew

item.title: Conlangs
item.description: I am proficient with Toki Pona, and was active in the Ithkuil community for several years and during the creation of New Ithkuil.

item.title: Hyperspeedcube
item.description:
Multidimensional twisty puzzle simulator

Hyperspeedcube is a modern, beginner-friendly 3D and 4D Rubik’s cube simulator with customizable mouse and keyboard controls and advanced features for speedsolving. It’s been used to break numerous speedsolving records and runs on all major operating systems plus the web.

item.title: Keyboard
item.description: I use the Colemak keyboard layout on a ZSA moonlander.

item.title: Music
item.description: I play piano, and occasionally create or modify arrangements of pieces I enjoy.

item.title: NDCell
item.description:
Multidimensional cellular automaton simulator

NDCell is a work-in-progress 2D and 3D cellular automaton simulator that I will hopefully return to someday. It currently has rendering, editing, and basic simulation working, but in the future it will hopefully have its own domain-specific cellular automaton specification language too.

item.title: Speedsolving
item.description: I speedsolve 3D and 4D Rubik’s cubes, and hold several hypercubing world records.
